# Set up

Open csv:
```{r}
climate_land_abund = read.csv(
  "~/Desktop/clim_land_arthropods/final_dat.csv")
```

Load packages:
```{r}
library(arm)
library(lme4)
library(lmerTest)
library(MuMIn)
library(polypoly)
library(psych)
library(performance)
library(car)
library(tidyverse)
library(FactoMineR)
library(mgcv)
```

```{r}
climate_land_abund <-
  climate_land_abund %>%
  dplyr::select(-X)
```

# Analysis

## 02. Pollinators (fg_pollinator_abund_scaled)

### Data frames

Data frame:
```{r}
climate_land_abund_02_100 <-
  climate_land_abund %>%
  filter(Pollinator_study == 1) %>%
  dplyr::select(
    fg_pollinator_abund_scaled,
    semi_100,
    edge_100,
    arable_100,
    TAP,
    MAT,
    min_temp,
    max_temp,
    StudyID_yr,
    Sampling_method,
    Block,
    Latitude,
    Longitude
  ) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  na.omit() %>%
  poly_add_columns(semi_100, degree = 2, prefix = "semi_") %>%
  poly_add_columns(edge_100, degree = 2, prefix = "edge_") %>%
  poly_add_columns(arable_100, degree = 2, prefix = "arable_") %>%
  poly_add_columns(TAP, degree = 2, prefix = "TAP_") %>%
  poly_add_columns(MAT, degree = 2, prefix = "MAT_") %>%
  poly_add_columns(min_temp, degree = 2, prefix = "min_temp_") %>%
  poly_add_columns(max_temp, degree = 2, prefix = "max_temp_") %>%
  mutate(
    fg_02_l = log1p(fg_pollinator_abund_scaled),
    semi_1_l = log1p(semi_1),
    semi_2_l = log1p(semi_2),
    edge_1_l = log1p(edge_1),
    edge_2_l = log1p(edge_2),
    arable_1_l = log1p(arable_1),
    arable_2_l = log1p(arable_2),
    TAP_1_l = log1p(TAP_1),
    TAP_2_l = log1p(TAP_2),
    MAT_1_l = log1p(MAT_1),
    MAT_2_l = log1p(MAT_2),
    min_temp_1_l = log1p(min_temp_1),
    min_temp_2_l = log1p(min_temp_2),
    max_temp_1_l = log1p(max_temp_1),
    max_temp_2_l = log1p(max_temp_2)
  )
```

### Models 

Random error structure:
```{r}
mod_null_02_100 <- lmer(
    fg_02_l ~
        1 +
        (1 | StudyID_yr) +
        (1 | StudyID_yr:Sampling_method:Block),
    data = climate_land_abund_02_100,
    na.action = "na.fail"
)
isSingular(mod_null_02_100)

mod_null_02_250 <- lmer(
    fg_02_l ~
        1 +
        (1 | StudyID_yr) +
        (1 | StudyID_yr:Sampling_method:Block),
    data = climate_land_abund_02_250,
    na.action = "na.fail"
)
isSingular(mod_null_02_250)

mod_null_02_500 <- lmer(
    fg_02_l ~

        (1 | StudyID_yr) +

    na.action = "na.fail"
)
isSingular(mod_null_02_500)
```

## 11. Habitat specialist natural enemies with ground dispersal (ts_nat_gen_ground_noncrop_abund_scaled)

### Data frames

Data frame:
```{r}
climate_land_abund_11_100 <-
  climate_land_abund %>%
  filter(Nat_enemy_study == 1) %>%
  dplyr::select(
    ts_nat_gen_ground_noncrop_abund_scaled,
    semi_100,
    edge_100,
    arable_100,
    TAP,
    MAT,
    min_temp,
    max_temp,
    StudyID_yr,
    Sampling_method,
    Block,
    Latitude,
    Longitude
  ) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  na.omit() %>%
  poly_add_columns(semi_100, degree = 2, prefix = "semi_") %>%
  poly_add_columns(edge_100, degree = 2, prefix = "edge_") %>%
  poly_add_columns(arable_100, degree = 2, prefix = "arable_") %>%
  poly_add_columns(TAP, degree = 2, prefix = "TAP_") %>%
  poly_add_columns(MAT, degree = 2, prefix = "MAT_") %>%
  poly_add_columns(min_temp, degree = 2, prefix = "min_temp_") %>%
  poly_add_columns(max_temp, degree = 2, prefix = "max_temp_") %>%
  mutate(
    ts_11_l = log1p(ts_nat_gen_ground_noncrop_abund_scaled),
    semi_1_l = log1p(semi_1),
    semi_2_l = log1p(semi_2),
    edge_1_l = log1p(edge_1),
    edge_2_l = log1p(edge_2),
    arable_1_l = log1p(arable_1),
```
